channel.title: All these years, seems no one got this
channel.description:
i am using "PkPlanet" source and client from years, today, i am bored from the client.. i want to change it! but wait! PkPlanet somehow logs you out if you are not using their client! LOL? how do i make it only works for ANOTHER client? not for pk planets client.. i don't want it removed ! but only it accepts another kind of client and refuses others.
-THANKS.

item.title: All these years, seems no one got this
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345

i want to change it!

not for pk planets client…
